## ShortcutRegistry.KeyboardShortcut interface

Interface defining a keyboard shortcut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface KeyboardShortcut 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowCollision?](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.allowcollision.md) |  | boolean | <p>_(Optional)_ Value of <code>allowCollision</code> to pass to <code>addKeyMapping</code> when binding this shortcut's <code>.keyCodes</code> (if any).</p><p>N.B.: this is only used for binding keycodes at the time this shortcut is initially registered, not for any subsequent <code>addKeyMapping</code> calls that happen to reference this shortcut's name.</p> |
|  [callback?](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.callback.md) |  | (workspace: [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md)<!-- -->, e: Event, shortcut: [KeyboardShortcut](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.md)<!-- -->, scope: Scope) =&gt; boolean | _(Optional)_ The function to be called when the shorctut is invoked. |
|  [keyCodes?](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.keycodes.md) |  | (number \| string)\[\] | _(Optional)_ Optional list of key codes to be bound (via ShortcutRegistry.prototype.addKeyMapping) to this shortcut. |
|  [metadata?](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.metadata.md) |  | object | _(Optional)_ Optional arbitray extra data attached to the shortcut. |
|  [name](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.name.md) |  | string | The name of the shortcut. Should be unique. |
|  [preconditionFn?](./blockly.shortcutregistry.keyboardshortcut.preconditionfn.md) |  | (workspace: [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md)<!-- -->, scope: Scope) =&gt; boolean | _(Optional)_ A function to be called when the shortcut is invoked, before calling <code>callback</code>, to decide if this shortcut is applicable in the current situation. |
